amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language barring any new funds from supporting the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) advanced technology program and prohibit the use of funds for anything other than continuation grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of July 21, 1995, to strike the provisions of the bill that eliminate funding for the Advanced Technology program of the Department of Commerce.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mollohan amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 223 (Roll no. 580).
